recipe_name: Flash-fried salmon with yellow pepper and onion salsa
author: Nick Nairn
method: For the salmon, heat the oil in a small frying pan over a high heat and fry the salmon slices for 20 seconds on each side, or until just cooked through. Remove the salmon from the pan to a serving plate and squeeze over the lemon juice. For the salsa, mix all the salsa ingredients together in a bowl and serve with the salmon.
ingredients: ½ tbsp olive oil,  150g/5½oz salmon fillet, sliced into pieces 0.5cm/½in thick,  ½ lemon, juice only,  ¼ yellow pepper, finely chopped,  ¼ red onion, finely chopped,  1 tsp chilli flakes,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 lemon, zest and juice
